snippet: The changes laid out a potential line of succession to Indra K. Nooyi and were aimed at addressing investor concerns over its stock price.
abstract: PepsiCo chief executive Indra K Nooyi announces several management changes clearly intended to reassure investors, who have become impatient over company's anemic stock price and the signature brand's loss of market share in the United States; John Compton is named president.
lead_paragraph: The changes laid out a potential line of succession to Indra K. Nooyi and were aimed at addressing investor concerns over its stock price.

headline.main: Pepsi Chief Shuffles Management to Soothe Investors
